title: Peas and jamon

ingredients.content: 50 g manchego cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm) (see Tips)
120 g jamon  , cut into slices (1 cm), then diced
½ tsp Chicken stock paste (see Tips)
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.

Place 500 g of the water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position and weigh peas and broad beans into it. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>12 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove peas and beans and transfer into a bowl of cold water for 2 minutes to cease cooking. Drain peas and beans, then peel broad beans and discard skin. Transfer beans and peas into a bowl and set aside. Rinse and dry mixing bowl.
Place eschalots and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add stock paste, remaining water and reserved peas and beans and cook <b>4 min/90°C//speed <b>.
Add salt and pepper and cook <b>5 min/90°C//speed <b>.
Serve immediately, garnished with mint and reserved cheese.

hintsAndTricks: Jamon is a Spanish cured ham; proscuitto can be used if jamon is not available.
Fino sherry is a dry, pale fortified wine and a traditional accompaniment to jamon. Dry white vermouth can be used instead.
Manchego is Spanish sheep's milk cheese. Any hard cheese, or even ricotta, can be used instead.

Frozen peas and broad beans can be used in this recipe. Omit steaming and place peas and beans into Varoma and run under cold water to remove any ice. Peel broad beans, set aside and add with stock paste and remaining water.
If using small broad beans, they may not need to be peeled (just podded).
Please refer to The Basic Cookbook or Everyday Cookbook for the Chicken stock paste recipe.
Liquid stock can be used instead of water and stock paste.
Turn peas and jamon leftovers into a purée to accompany fish or chicken.
Blend half of the quantity of peas and jamon for <b>10 sec/speed 10<b> and stir through the remainder and serve as a textured pasta sauce.
